roleset.name: to mix, merge
roleset.note: MELD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'meld' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from meld.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: P& G already has shown [0] it can meld some traditional packaged-goods techniques with the image-making of the cosmetics trade in the mass-market end of the business .
example.arg: with the image-making of the cosmetics trade
in the mass-market end of the business
